amendment.description: Page 2, after line 2, insert the following: SEC. 3. GAO REPORT ON IMPACT ON EMPLOYEE OWNERSHIP. Not later than 1 year after the date of the enactment of this Act, the Comptroller General of the United States shall submit to Congress a report on the impact on employee ownership of the revisions required by section 2, including the impact on-- ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in House Report 115-75 to require the GAO to report to Congress one year after date of enactment the impact of the legislation on employee ownership.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Polis amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Polis.
